result.eng: The king's only son was killed.
result.html: Maraíodh aonmhac an ríThe king's only son was killed.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ aonṁac an ríThe king's only son was killed.

result.eng: The stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ga: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.orig: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidh
result.html: Baineann na scéalta le saighdiúirí a mharaítear agus na mná a fhágtar ina ndiaidhThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.
result.ponchtml: Baineann na scéalta le saiġdiúirí a ṁaraítear agus na mná a ḟágtar ina ndiaiḋThe stories are about soldiers who are killed and women who are left behind.

result.eng: He would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ga: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.orig: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athair
result.html: Dhéanfadh sé aon rud chun díoltas a bhaint as toisc gur mharaigh sé a athairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.
result.ponchtml: Ḋéanfaḋ sé aon rud ċun díoltas a ḃaint as toisc gur ṁaraiġ sé a aṫairHe would do anything to take revenge on him because he had killed his father.

result.eng: Two people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ga: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.orig: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eile
result.html: Maraíodh beirt agus goineadh triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.
result.ponchtml: Maraíoḋ beirt agus goineaḋ triúr eileTwo people were killed and three others were injured.

result.eng: Maybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ga: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.orig: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimse
result.html: B'fhéidir go raibh a fhios ag Bin Laden sular mharaigh fórsaí speisialta Mheiriceá é gur athraigh sé an domhan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir go raiḃ a ḟios ag Bin Laden sular ṁaraiġ fórsaí speisialta Ṁeiriceá é gur aṫraiġ sé an doṁan as cuimseMaybe Bin Laden knew before he was killed by American special forces that he had changed the world utterly.

result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.html: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ponchtml: Muirfear ṫú aċ tú ag gaḃáil 'un an ḃaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
